t: Amazon Takes Batman: Caped Crusader Under Its Wing
s: March 10, 2023 - ‘Batman: Caped Crusader’ has received a two-season order at Amazon. The animated series from J.J. Abrams, Matt Reeves and Bruce Timm was previously canceled by HBO Max in August. No release date has been announced for the 10-episode first season.
